name: Major GUN 2: war on terror
description:
FPS with sniper and PvP modes. Are you ready for some shooting action? Download the best shooting game for free!

Take your gun, aim and start shooting your enemies.
You will love Major Gun: one of the most fun and addicting mobile shooting games ever! PvP and sniper modes included.

FIGHT the global war on terror.

Major Gun features:
● Ultra REALISTIC 3D shooting action with cool graphics and animations
● Thrilling MISSIONS: stay tuned for new missions coming each month
● Tons of heavy weapons: play with 100's of different guns, rifles, and sniper guns!
● 4 incredible worlds to clean from the terrorists. Survivors need your help!
● Two PvP modes: Kill your time in shooting range. It's serious shooting range and Real time PvP sniper. Compete with players all round the world.
● Check reviews of our players!
● Hunting games? Golf games? Dart games? Archery games? All boring stuff. Start competing and shooting enemies
